readme:
## Who is this template for?

This template is for any Microsoft Outlook user who wants a trained AI agent to reason and reply on their behalf. Teach your agent tone and writing style to replicate your own, or develop a persona for a shared inbox.

## Requirements

  * Outlook with authentication credentials
  * OpenAI account with authentication credentials
  * A few sample email replies of various lengths and topics



### How it works:

  1. Connect your Outlook account.



![Screenshot 20250305 at 5.27.06 PM.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2025_03_05_at_5_27_06_PM_cd72ae79fa.png)

  1. Select (filter) which email sender(s) your trained AI agent will reply to.



_[Tip: pick a sender that has some repeatability either with a topic (ie. sales) or an individual ([coworker@yourcompany.com](mailto:coworker@yourcompany.com))]_

![Screenshot 20250305 at 6.22.11 PM.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2025_03_05_at_6_22_11_PM_96a8dc0910.png)

  1. Connect your OpenAI account. Choose your AI model (ie. gpt-4o-mini)



![Screenshot 20250305 at 5.41.05 PM.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2025_03_05_at_5_41_05_PM_93ea0105a9.png)

  1. Add Prompt (User Message) and select "system message" from the option below



![Screenshot 20250305 at 5.46.13 PM.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2025_03_05_at_5_46_13_PM_d0525c1a9e.png)

  1. Update the instructions by filling in your name (or persona), response style, and add full email replies from the topic or individual you want the AI agent to emulate.



[Tip: Add actual replies from your email sent folder, including your greeting and sign off. Paste each email sample between a set of <example> .... </example> tags]

![Screenshot 20250305 at 5.47.32 PM.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2025_03_05_at_5_47_32_PM_39553b09b6.png)

  1. Configure the reply (or reply all) to remain within the original email string



![Screenshot 20250305 at 6.03.30 PM.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2025_03_05_at_6_03_30_PM_17be113209.png)

  1. Test it! Send an email from the address to which your agent wants to respond. Check your sent (or draft) folder for the result.



![Screenshot 20250305 at 6.30.21 PM.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2025_03_05_at_6_30_21_PM_721ceacd21.png)

  1. Enjoy all the free time you now have!!
  2. If you have questions or need assistance, email us at: [support@teambisonandbird.com](mailto:support@teambisonandbird.com)



++This template does not include retrieving email addresses out of the message or body of the email.++
